messages.content: ComfyUI is a GUI that uses a stable diffusion model to generate images and videos.
Comfyui-discopixel is a small collection of custom nodes created by Discopixel for use with ComfyUI.
What does the 'Transform Template onto Face Mask' node do?
The 'Transform Template onto Face Mask' node takes a template and a face mask as inputs, and transforms the template to fit over the face by calculating the centroid and eigenvectors of the face.
What is the assumption made by the 'Transform Template onto Face Mask' node?
The 'Transform Template onto Face Mask' node assumes there is only one shape in the face mask, and that the shape is comprised of white pixels over a black background.
To install comfyui-discopixel, you need to clone the repo into your ComfyUI extensions directory and then install the dependencies using your preferred method.
What command should be used to clone the comfyui-discopixel repo?
The command to clone the comfyui-discopixel repo is `git clone https://github.com/discopixel-studio/comfyui-discopixel`.
What command should be used to install the dependencies for comfyui-discopixel?
The command to install the dependencies for comfyui-discopixel is `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`.
